contest-event.event-date:
June 4, 1982 D Scouthead (Whit Friday)
Scouthead (Whit Friday) 0 March Contest Whit Friday Saddleworth scouthead-whit-friday
Huddersfield Road, Scouthead Deportment prize - British Airways. Best local - Federated Brass. Best youth - Besses Boys. Result as shown in British Bandsman 12/6/1982., Alex Greenhalgh in his book 'Hail Smiling Morn' shows Newton Heath as best local. 42 bands competed.
Jan. 2, 2012, 5:21 p.m. April 5, 2016, 3:40 p.m.

2 Hammonds Junior Band Unknown
3 Fairey Band Unknown
4 Rochdale Band Unknown
